column1: Food insecurity by selected demographic characteristics 1 2 3
Geography: Canada, Geographical region of Canada, Province or territory

column2: Source: Canadian Income Survey, Centre for Income and Socioeconomic Well-being Statistics, Statistics Canada

Data quality indicators are based on the coefficient of variation (CV) and number of observations. Quality indicators indicate the following: A - Excellent (CV between 0% and 2%); B - Very good (CV between 2% and 4%); C - Good (CV between 4% and 8%); D - Acceptable (CV between 8% and 16%); E - Use with caution (CV between 16% and 33.3%).
Estimates for Canada do not include the territories.
Includes marginal, moderate and severe food insecurity.

column1: How to cite: Statistics Canada. Table 13-10-0835-01  Food insecurity by selected demographic characteristics
